summary: VEHICLE SHUTDOWN:  AS I APPROACHED A YIELD SIGN ON A SUBDIVISON STREET, I SLOWED TO A FEW MPH BEFORE ACCELERATING SLOWLY AGAIN.  THE VEHICLE THEN LOST POWER AND STEERING (IT SHUTDOWN).  I LOOKED AT MY DASH AND IT READ "VEHICLE MUST BE IN PARK TO START."  I APPLIED THE BRAKE AND STOPPED WITHOUT BEING ABLE TO STEER. I THEN TURNED THE GEAR KNOB TO PARK AND RESTARTED THE VEHICLE AND WENT ON MY WAY.  I AM THANKFUL THEIR WAS NO TRAFFIC AS THIS COULD HAVE RESULTED IN A SERIOUS ACCIDENT...UPDATED 10/30/17 *BF  UPDATED 11/13/217*JS
